title: What are the steps toward getting your account unbanned?
body: My account has been banned for I wanna say 3-4 years now. I saw that a recent player and known streamer loltyler1 recently gotten unbanned. I was wondering what steps I have to take to get my account unbanned as well. I'm not sure if they take different steps with people in the public eye, but I want to be unbanned aswell.

replies.body:
Looks like this account went through the normal escalation process with chances to reform, which were in the form of chat restrictions. Accounts that go through this won't be unbanned. 

There's some slight confusion regarding T1 getting "unbanned" when that's not quite what happened at all. For more info on what happened there, feel free to read through [**this article**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115013815928).

I think there should be some sort of progress towards getting un-banned for everyone. Especially for people like me who have had their account banned for over 4+ years. Yeah sure, people go ahead and just make another account anyways, but it would be nice to be able to retrieve an account you spent countless hours on playing with people you've added on League over the years. Thank you for the explanation nonetheless.
